attributes.action: grant the British people a referendum on the proposed EU Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Three years ago the Prime Minister said: “You cannot have a situation where you get a rejection of the treaty and bring it back with a few amendments and say, ‘Have another go’.” 

But this is exactly what is happening today. The proposals give more power to the EU, including control of our criminal justice system. This alters Britain's relationship with the EU. 

Therefore we call on the Prime Minister to honour his original promise to allow a referendum to decide if Britain should ratify the elements contained in the treaty.
